original_text: Now when he came nigh to the gate of the city, behold, there was a dead man carried out, the only son of his mother, and she was a widow: and much people of the city was with her.
korean_text: 성문에 가까이 이르실 때에 사람들이 한 죽은 자를 메고 나오니 이는 한 어머니의 독자요 그의 어머니는 과부라 그 성의 많은 사람도 그와 함께 나오거늘

sentences.original_text: Now when he came nigh to the gate of city
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 그가 성문에 가까이 왔을 때

sentences.original_text: there was a dead man carried out
and much people of city was with her
sentences.korean_translation: 성의 많은 사람들이 그녀와 함께 있었다
